products.name: Chocolate Cooling Tunnel
products.temperature_range: Air or water cooled tunnel (typically 5-10°C, some down to 0°C)
products.applications: Chocolate enrobing lines, molded chocolates, chocolate drops, and bakery products.
products.features: Length/temp built to product. Modular design, adjustable belt speed, CPU-controlled climate system, energy-saving CFC-free insulation.
products.differentiator: Modular design with customizable length and temperature control for chocolate processing.

specifications.cooling_method: Controlled air circulation, sometimes with cold slab cooling

products.name: Gel Cooling Tunnel
products.applications: Gels/OTC tubes, confectionery, bakery, and pharmaceutical products.
products.features: ISO-certified build, 1-yr warranty noted. Automatic operation, temperature sensors, PLC control with HMI touch screen panels, and adjustable cooling zones.
products.differentiator: Precise temperature control with PLC/HMI interface for pharmaceutical and confectionery applications.

specifications.cooling_method: Forced air ventilation, water spraying, or glycol-cooled heat exchangers with fans
specifications.insulation: Thick insulation (polystyrene, polyurethane, or foamed PVC)

products.name: Jam Cooling Tunnel
products.applications: Hot-filled jam jars, bottles, or pouches to preserve product quality and extend shelf life.
products.features: Continuous cooling for texture & shelf life. Water spray nozzles for cooling, automatic temperature control, PLC touch screen interfaces.
products.differentiator: Water spray cooling system optimized for hot-filled jam processing and preservation.

specifications.cooling_method: Water spray nozzles (sometimes with chilled air or refrigeration)

products.name: Bakery/Peanut-Butter Cooling Tunnel
products.conveyor_build: Automatic operation, CE/ISO/UL options. Stainless steel construction.
products.applications: Bakery products (cookies, biscuits, cakes, bread) and peanut butter production.
products.features: High throughput, 10-30 min holding. Multiple temperature control zones, adjustable conveyor speed, uniform airflow distribution, modular design.
products.differentiator: High-capacity system with multiple temperature zones for bakery and peanut butter production.

specifications.cooling_method: Convection cooling from top, water-cooled bottom plates
